entry.title: Photos Post 29: Special Events (after 1975), Part 07
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 2 Photos of the special event 1990-0321 Departure, Australia have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 2 high resolutions from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the 2 Photos in the smallest gallery: Australia 1990.
Please kindly share the links with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam

entry.title: Photos Post 30: Updates
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We would like to bring to your attention that the Lotus Feet galleries are up to date. Grouped chronologically, they form 32 galleries of the folder Permanent Displays.
Please keep in mind that, as the CCT database is monthly organized, in due time some of these galleries will be divided into 2 or more galleries.
Please kindly share the news and the folder's link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam

entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to bring to your attention 1 new art gallery Enlightened Poems Framed and 1 new Subfolder Palazzo Doria 1997 Fall of the Folder Shri Mataji's Places; this subfolder currently has 1 thematic gallery Dogs.
Please kindly share the news and the links with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
